bs-upload-multiupload-link-label: Text label of a menu entry in left navigation
bs-deferred-action-apiupload-description:
Description of an action that uploads a file to the wiki.

Parameters:
* $1 - The source file name
* $2 - The target file name
bs-uploader-mime-images-label:
Label used in a drop down that allows filtering for certain file types. Filters for image file types.
{{Identical|Image}}
bs-uploader-mime-files-label:
Label used in a drop down that allows filtering for certain file types. Filters for all but image file types.
{{Identical|File}}
bs-multiupload-tag-button-label-default: Label for button that allows upload of files
bs-multiupload-tag-dropzone-label-defaul: Label for a dropzone that allows upload of files
bs-multiupload-tag-error-invalid prefix:
Error message if an invalid filename prefix was provided in tha tag attributes.

Parameters:
* $1 - The provided value
bs-multiupload-tag-error-invalid-categor:
Error message if an invalid category was provided in tha tag attributes.

Parameters:
* $1 - The number of invalid values
* $2 - The list of invalid values
bs-multiupload-tag-hint-reloadpage: A message displayed to the user before the page will be reloaded
